title: Why was I put in Lower Priority Queue when I have not afked for a single game in the last 10 games
body:
I don't understand. LeaverBuster said that I'd been abandoning matches/afking and placed me in Lower Priority Queue.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/489Gq4C.png[/img]

But I haven't left any of my last 10 games midway:

[img]http://i.imgur.com/G1hzHRK.png[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/sx7Ngmk.png[/img]

I only had some connection problems at the start of the last game (the rengar game), but I did play the game anyway (and it was a bot game too).

So why was I put in LPQ ? Can someone take me out ? I'm not sure how it works, but I'm not going to wait 10 min to play a game like I have to now.

replies.body: i had connection issues too and it counted as a leave and i had my charger stop working mid game got that fixed 3 days later go on league ur in low priotity queue check my forum post ill show u
Sometimes the punishments from Leavebuster are really slow to update. Are you sure you've never left a game in the past?

same thing happened to one of my other accounts.
at least you didnt get banned lol
